Ten of Anything is an educational program of the Amercan Legion Auxiliary, donating ten of anything, ten pencils, ten bottles of glue, ten notebooks, etc. to schools during National Education Week. This is the thirteenth year Lawrence Unit #28 participated in this program. 98 "Ten of Anything" was donated or 980 items. BGS received pencils, pens, paper, folders, glue, crayons and several other educational items to help their students.
